page.title: 17Home Life - Daily Visitors
page.content: Early in the morning the Postman has to sort out the letters at the Post Office.Then he has to deliver the letters and parcels to your door. The Milkman delivers the milk and he also brings yogurt,bread and potatoes if you want them. The Insurance Man comes to our home to collect money to insure our house in case of fire or burglary. The Rag and Bone Man rides around the streets collecting old things that we no longer want.He comes in a van now, but he used to have a horse and cart. The Avon Lady calls with a sales book for cosmetics.There are samples of lipstick and perfume.You choose what you want,fill in a form,and pay later. The Window Cleaner comes each week with his leather duster,bucket of water and ladder to clean the windows.
